name: WASTE MANAGEMENT (snowdozer)
description:
A game I made a while ago, uploaded for Fragment Jam (as such, it is dusty, old and unfinished!).  Absorb the ground and use it as your weapon!  Survive wave after wave of enemies as your ammo dwindles and the ground starts to disappear.

CONTROLS

WASD or arrow keys to move.

P or Z to magnetize.

O or X to launch.

Post-mortem can be found here.
